rows.label: qst300201_msg001
rows.name: (仮)受注条件を満たしていない(世間話)

rows.label: qst300201_msg0001
rows.name:
Heya. Looks like the mercs are finding
their feet again, and about time too.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0002
rows.name:
It's all down to you too. You've put a
helluva effort in. But, the thing is...

rows.label: qst300201_msg0003
rows.name:
Some of the vets still aren't all that
keen on accepting an outsider as
our boss.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0004
rows.name:
But it's to be expected. Trust isn't
something you win overnight.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0005
rows.name:
So I asked around a bit, tried to
get folks' opinions on the issue.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0006
rows.name:
Basically, best thing for it would be
to have a couple of sparring matches
with some of the old hands.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0007
rows.name:
Easiest way to win our
respect as leader is through
a show of strength.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0008
rows.name:
You get what I'm saying, yeah?
Good on you!

rows.label: qst300201_msg0009
rows.name:
Could head over to the training ground?
Cheers!

rows.label: qst300201_msg0010
rows.name:
We've already got a line-up ready
for you.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0011
rows.name:
No need to go easy on 'em. They're
used to getting a few bruises!

rows.label: qst300201_msg0101
rows.name:
We're having the sparring matches
over at the training ground. If you
could head there now, that'd be ace.
